description: Try our easy to follow Honey Soy Pork With Asian Slaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Honey Soy Pork With Asian Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Chinese broccoli, large stalks discarded, leaves shredded
1 lime, rind finely grated and juiced

recipeInstructions.text: Place honey, soy and ginger into a small pan. Bring to the boil over high heat, cook for 2 minutes or until reduced by half and thickened. Set aside for 5 minutes to cool slightly.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper and place a wire rack on top. Place pork on rack and brush with honey mixture. Scatter over sesame seeds. Roast for 20-25 minutes or until cooked through. Loosely cover with foil and rest for 5 minutes.

Meanwhile, to make slaw, combine chilli, honey, fish sauce, lime rind and juice into a small bowl. Set aside. Combine remaining ingredients in a bowl. When ready to serve, heat rice according to packet instructions and place in a serving bowl. Gently toss 3/4 of the dressing with salad and place over rice. Top with sliced pork and serve drizzled with remaining dressing.
